field.label: Domain
field.help: If a domain is entered here, queries for this specific domain will be forwarded to the specified server. Leave blank to forward all queries to the specified server (default).

field.label: Server IP
field.help: IP address of DNS server to forward all requests.

field.label: Server Port
field.help: Port of DNS server, for usual DNS use 53, if you use DoT set it to 853.

field.label: Verify CN
field.help: The Common Name of the DNS server (e.g. dns.example.com). This field is required to verify its TLS certificate. DNS-over-TLS is susceptible to man-in-the-middle attacks unless certificates can be verified. Leave empty to accept self-signed yet also potentially fraudulent certificates.
